title: Formative Assessment-Based Foreign Language Writing Instruction Design: Strengthening Practical Competencies for Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English writing proficiency and practical experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Conducted in BYOD environments for current elementary science practitioners. Emphasizing practical writing skill enhancement through formative assessment feedback

learning_goals: Learners can write science lab reports in English and produce a final draft incorporating feedback from at least three revisions
Learners can present cases where they improved at least five writing expressions through peer and self-assessment
Learners can explain the process of analyzing formative assessment results and incorporating them into the objectives of the next writing task
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
